title: Draining Oil
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss the USGA allowing LIV Tour players to play in the US Open, the Colorado Avalanche sweeping the Edmonton Oilers with a win in overtime, and Mark Messier joins the show. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The USGA will Allow LIV Tour golfers to play at the US Open and the Avalanche advance to the Stanley Cup Finals
